name: Six Double Objective
objective: Six separated groups each one composed of two adjacent tiles of the same type (not necessarily as showed in figure). Tiles in a group could be different from those in another group.

name: Diagonal
objective: Five tiles of the same type that forms a diagonal.

name: Angles
objective: Four tiles of the same type at the four angles of the Library.

name: Four rows different types
objective: Four rows each one composed of five tiles of one, two or three different types. Different tiles can have different combinations of types.

name: Vertical four
objective: Four separated groups each one composed of four adjacent tiles of the same type (not necessarily as showed in figure). Tiles in a group could be different from those in another group.

name: Vertical different six
objective: Two columns each one composed of 6 different types of tiles.

name: Group of 4 tiles
objective: Two separated groups composed of 4 tiles of the same type that creates a 2x2 square. Tiles of the two groups must be of the same type.

name: Row of 5 different tiles
objective: Two rows each one composed of 5 different tiles type.

name: Three columns different types
objective: Three columns each one composed of 6 tiles of one, two or three different tile types. Different columns can have different combinations of tile types.

name: X
objective: Five tiles of the same type that creates an x.

name: Eight tiles no restriction
objective: Eight tiles of the same type. No restrictions on the position of these tiles.

name: Inferior diagonal
objective: Five columns of increasing or decreasing height: starting from left or right first column, every next column must be composed of an additional tile. Tiles can be of different types.
